alert.note: Alert for Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL PIKE AND SOUTHERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Greenfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Waverly, Bainbridge, North Folk Village, South Salem, Summithill, Bourneville, Knockemstiff, Massieville, Lattaville, Scioto Trail State Park and Buchanan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
